statements: SELECT species_name, habitat_name FROM endangered_species WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_location, species_name FROM endangered_species WHERE habitat_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM endangered_species WHERE habitat_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT species_name, habitat_name FROM endangered_species WHERE habitat_name LIKE '%forest%';
SELECT species_id, habitat_id, habitat_location FROM endangered_species ORDER BY species_id DESC;
SELECT species_name, habitat_name FROM endangered_species WHERE habitat_id = 1;
SELECT species_name, habitat_location FROM endangered_species WHERE species_name LIKE 'P%' ORDER BY habitat_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, habitat_name, habitat_location FROM endangered_species WHERE species_id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY habitat_name, species_name;
SELECT * FROM endangered_species WHERE habitat_location IS NOT NULL AND habitat_id BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT DISTINCT species_name, habitat_name, habitat_location FROM endangered_species WHERE species_name <> 'Tiger' ORDER BY species_name ASC, habitat_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM endangered_species;
SELECT species_name, habitat_id FROM endangered_species;
SELECT location, species_name, habitat_id FROM endangered_species WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_type FROM habitats;
SELECT habitat_name, region FROM habitats WHERE habitat_id = 2;
SELECT species_name, location FROM endangered_species WHERE habitat_id = 1;
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_type FROM habitats WHERE habitat_id = 2 ORDER BY habitat_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM endangered_species WHERE habitat_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM endangered_species WHERE location IS NOT NULL AND species_name LIKE '%tiger%';
SELECT species_name, habitat_name FROM endangered_species JOIN habitats ON endangered_species.habitat_id = habitats.habitat_id;
SELECT * FROM endangered_species;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM endangered_species WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT habitat_name, location_geometry FROM habitats ORDER BY habitat_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, population_size, habitat_type FROM endangered_species INNER JOIN habitats ON endangered_species.habitat_id = habitats.habitat_id;

SELECT species_name, habitat_name FROM endangered_species JOIN species_distribution ON endangered_species.species_id = species_distribution.species_id JOIN habitats ON species_distribution.habitat_id = habitats.habitat_id WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest';
SELECT * FROM endangered_species ORDER BY species_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM endangered_species WHERE habitat_type='Jungle';
SELECT species_name, habitat_name FROM endangered_species INNER JOIN habitats ON endangered_species.habitat_id = habitats.habitat_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_species FROM endangered_species;
SELECT habitat_name, COUNT(species_name) AS total_species FROM endangered_species INNER JOIN habitats ON endangered_species.habitat_id = habitats.habitat_id GROUP BY habitat_name;
SELECT * FROM species;
SELECT species_name, habitat_id FROM species WHERE habitat_id = 1;
SELECT species_id, species_name FROM species ORDER BY species_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM species;
SELECT species_name, habitat_id FROM species WHERE species_name LIKE '%bird%';
SELECT * FROM species WHERE habitat_id = 1;
SELECT species_name, habitat_name FROM species JOIN habitats ON species.habitat_id = habitats.habitat_id;
SELECT species_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM species GROUP BY species_name ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT species_name, habitat_name FROM species JOIN habitats ON species.habitat_id = habitats.habitat_id WHERE species_id IN (SELECT species_id FROM distribution WHERE habitat_id = 2);

SELECT species_name, latitude, longitude FROM species JOIN spatial_information ON species.habitat_id = spatial_information.habitat_id WHERE latitude > 10 AND longitude < -20 ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM species;
SELECT species_name, habitat_id FROM species ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT species_id, species_name FROM species WHERE habitat_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM endangered_species WHERE endangerment_level = 'CRITICALLY ENDANGERED';
SELECT habitat_name FROM habitats WHERE ST_Contains(habitat_location, 'POINT(1 1)');
SELECT species_name, endangerment_level FROM endangered_species INNER JOIN species ON endangered_species.species_id = species.species_id
SELECT * FROM habitats

SELECT species_name, habitat_name FROM species INNER JOIN species_habitats ON species.species_id = species_habitats.species_id INNER JOIN habitats ON species_habitats.habitat_id = habitats.habitat_id WHERE habitat_id = 1
SELECT * FROM endangered_species WHERE endangerment_level = 'CRITICAL'

SELECT species_name, habitat_name, distribution_area FROM species INNER JOIN species_habitats ON species.species_id = species_habitats.species_id INNER JOIN habitats ON species_habitats.habitat_id = habitats.habitat_id INNER JOIN habitat_distribution ON species_habitats.habitat_id = habitat_distribution.habitat_id
